mapper.insert: insert into tbl_favorite (mygroup_no, favorite_emp_no, reg_user) values (#{mygroupNo}, #{orgaNo}, #{regUser});
mapper.select: select fa.favorite_emp_no as orga_no , e.emp_no , e.emp_name , em.emp_rank , e.username , FN_GET_HIERARCHY_ORGA(fa.favorite_emp_no) as path , e.emp_phone , fa.mygroup_no from tbl_favorite fa join tbl_mygroup my on fa.mygroup_no = my.mygroup_no join tbl_orga o on fa.favorite_emp_no = o.orga_no join tbl_emp_mapping em on o.orga_no = em.orga_no join tbl_emp e on em.emp_no = e.emp_no where fa.mygroup_no=${mygroupNo};
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_favorite where mygroup_no=#{mygroupNo} and favorite_emp_no=#{orgaNo};
